name: Primordial Eden
description:
PRIMORDIAL EDEN

We find ourselves 3.5 billion years in the past. Two alien creatures find themselves on the young Earth following the collision with planet Theia. Eugene and Oxy are the polar opposites of each other in personality, but they must work together and stand by each other's side so that they may survive in this strange, harsh world.

This is a small paleontology-themed fantasy interactive and educational game, in a style inspired by retro PS1 and N64 games.

CONTROLS
Move with W, A, S, D or arrow keys
Jump with SPACE
Move the camera with MOUSE

(Note: This game is my first experience with game developing, and it was created solely by me as part of my university thesis. I am mainly an artist and by no means a programmer, so this isn't something too grand to behold. Still, I hope you enjoy it!)

This game is FREE to download and play. You may choose to donate to me if you would like to support me ❤️

Follow my twitter! https://twitter.com/petchricore
